definition: Ministry of Health
to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet
surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: Two are beyond the direct control of the health sector.
sentences.chinese: 其中的两个危机在卫生部门的直接控制之外。

sentences.english: The Purchasing Card for Psychotropic Drugs shall be made solely by the Ministry of Public Health.
sentences.chinese: 精神药品购用卡》由卫生部统一制定。

sentences.english: Health Minister Chen Zhu, to the General Assembly sent a congratulatory message.
sentences.chinese: 卫生部部长陈竺向大会发来了贺信。

sentences.english: Health Minister Chen studied at Paris's St-Louis Hospital.
sentences.chinese: 卫生部部长陈竺在巴黎的圣路易医院学习。

sentences.english: The health sector regulates the quality and safety of food and pharmaceutical products.
sentences.chinese: 卫生部门控制食品和药品的质量与安全。

sentences.english: However, the Ministry of Health plans to continue intense surveillance activities.
sentences.chinese: 但是，卫生部计划继续大力开展监测活动。

sentences.english: Treating efficacy of meropenem was evaluated according to instructing principle of new drug clinical research issued by Ministry of Health.
sentences.chinese: 根据卫生部新药临床研究指导原则标准判定疗效。

sentences.english: Additional resources have also been provided to paediatric health care providers by the Ministry of Health.
sentences.chinese: 卫生部还为儿科医护机构提供了更多资源。

sentences.english: The Indian health ministry has described the report as "sensational".
sentences.chinese: 印度卫生部称这一报道是哗众取宠。

sentences.english: Anti-drugs campaign created for the department of Health in Norway.
sentences.chinese: 反毒品运动创造了挪威卫生部门。

sentences.english: Leaders in sectors with far more clout than health are making a similar point .
sentences.chinese: 影响力远胜卫生部门的领导人也发表了类似的看法。

sentences.english: As action accelerates, the responsibility on the health sector increases.
sentences.chinese: 随着行动加快步伐，卫生部门的责任也在增加。

sentences.english: Excellent collaboration between the Ministry of Health and the WHO team continues.
sentences.chinese: 卫生部与世卫组织小组之间继续极好的合作。

sentences.english: The results were reported directly to policy-makers at the Ministry of Health.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果被直接报告给卫生部的政策制定者。

sentences.english: The containment and control measures that have been implemented by the MoH to date are in accordance with international best practice.
sentences.chinese: 乌干达卫生部迄今采取的控制措施符合国际最佳做法。

sentences.english: The health sector means there is no evidence of someone's farm work program error.
sentences.chinese: 卫生部门指目前无证据显示涉事农场的工作程序出错。
